title: Intro into Javascript
content: JavaScript is really super cool. You can use it for front-end and back-end.

title: HTML Fundamentals
content: This article tells you about the DOCTYPE tag as well as the primary tags used for structuring your HTML page.

title: Semantic HTML
content: An article combating divitis and other problems that occur from poor page structure. Some of the topics include: (1) Accessibility of your application, (2) Search engine optimization, (3) Code maintainability.
